Package explorer.ui

This is the graphical management package.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Clearable Clearable specifies the method clear.
FileHandler FileHandler describes the methods needed by the file ui
Refresher Refresher describes the methods needed by the RefreshUI
 

Class Summary
Dialog Dialog is a convenience class for constructing dialogs.
DTMenuBar A Menu Bar for Device Tree
EditUI EditUI is responsible for setting up the view part of the menu- and tool-bar.
FileUI FileUI is responsible for handling the file part of the user interface.
PreferencesDialog PreferencesDialog is a singleton class, since you normally only need one of them in an application.
RefreshUI RefreshUI is responsible for handling the refresh part fo the user interface.
RunUI RunUI is responsible for setting up the run part of the menu- and tool-bar.
UIBit UIBit is a convenience class for creating menus and buttons.
UIDialog A panel to choose the gloabal aspect of the application (metal, etc...)
 

Package explorer.ui Description

This is the graphical management package. You will find here some usefull "kits" for the Device Tree application.

See Device Tree Manual for more informations.
